title: What happens when you cross the borders of the United States illegally?
subtitle: A viral Facebook article comparing U.S. immigration policy with North Korea's and Afghanistan's policy misunderstands most of the facts.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Undocumented immigrants in the United States receive a job, a driver's license, food stamps, health care, housing, education, "a seven-year tax-free job," and "child benefits."
